summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganHSA/FSA eligibleNaturium's Dew-Glow Moisturizer SPF 50 is formulated with organic/chemical sunscreen filters that apply invisibly on all skin tones to provide broad spectrum SPF 50 PA++++ protection while leaving a dewy, radiant finish. Niacinamide + ethyl ascorbic acid visibly improve the look of the complexion.
details: DetailsBenefitsSunscreen moisturizer with SPF 50 protectionProvides a dewy glowWorks well under makeupDermatologist testedFragrance freeVegan, paraben & cruelty freeFeatures1/4 teaspoon dip cap - a convenient guide for how much sunscreen to applyInvisible on all skin tonesLeaves a dewy, radiant finishKey IngredientsOrganic/Chemical Sunscreen Filters: Applies invisibly on all skin tones, provides broad spectrum protection and has a lightweight feel on skinNiacinamide: Reduces appearance of uneven skin tone, improves look of enlarged pores and works to balance and reduce oil production3-0 Ethyl Ascorbic Acid: Stable vitamin C derivative, provides anti-oxidant protection from free radicals nd helps brighten appearance of skinActive Ingredients: Homosalate 100%, Octisalate 50% and Avobenzone 30%Item 2627346How To UseAs the last step in your morning skincare routine, apply evenly onto the face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure. Pro tip: use the dip cap to perfectly measure the 1/4 teaspoon sunscreen dose recommended. See Drug Facts for complete usage.For external use only. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. When using this product keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove. Keep out of reach of children. If product is swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.IngredientsAqua (Water), Butyloctyl Salicylate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycrylene, VP/Eicosene Copolymer, Stearyl Dimethicone, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Niacinamide, Tocopherol, Cetearyl Olivate, Bisabolol, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Squalane, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Hydroxyacetophenone, Silica, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Octadecene, Sorbitan Olivate, Sorbitan Oleate, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Polyisobutene, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide.
how_to_use: As the last step in your morning skincare routine, apply evenly onto the face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure. Pro tip: use the dip cap to perfectly measure the 1/4 teaspoon sunscreen dose recommended. See Drug Facts for complete usage.For external use only. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. When using this product keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove. Keep out of reach of children. If product is swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.

reviews.headline: Daily SPF, constantly repurchasing
reviews.comments: Big fan of this sunscreen. I like the size of the tube because it's easy to travel with and I appreciate the high level of SPF. Sunscreen is moisturizing. Sometimes it's hard to get product out of tube when more than half way empty.

reviews.headline: BROWN GIRL FRIENDLY
reviews.comments: No white cast, not super oily BUT dewyâ€” which is hard for brands to differenciate. It is so hard to find a good, high SPF. I've been using this SPF for about a year now! Highly reccomend it!

reviews.headline: Holy Grail
reviews.comments: My 50 yr old, dry skin LOVES this! It keeps me dewy and hydrated all day, and wears well under makeup. I do feel this is better for dry skin. For me this has been a holy grail the past 2 years. I've repurchased it more times than I can count.

reviews.headline: Not a fan
reviews.comments: I tried this for a while and its not for me. It feels like an oily occlusive mask. I will use the rest of the bottle on my hands.

reviews.headline: Dewy with Sun protection
reviews.comments: I was impressed by the white formula actually absorbing into my skin and not leaving a white cast. It gives great sun coverage (I live in Denver and need to wear sunscreen daily). I also love how it makes my skin look dewy!

reviews.headline: The best sunscreen!
reviews.comments: I'm on my third tube! I have oily skin, and this sunscreen has been the best I've ever used!

reviews.headline: Thick, moisturizing, and glowy!!
reviews.comments: My skin looks SO BEAUTIFUL AND HEALTHY after using this sunscreen. I like to apply it in two layers to make it easier to apply. Even though it has the measuring feature in the cap, I've just been using about 2 pumps because it's enough to evenly cover my entire face. I only give it four stars because it has a slight sunscreen smell. It doesn't bother me too much, but it's definitely there. Also it sits perfectly under makeup and makes it look FLAWLESS!!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Favorite sunscreen (I've tried them all)

reviews.headline: Absolutely love this sunscreen!
reviews.comments: This makes my acne prone skin feel so nice! I love all the ingredients in this. It really absorbs into the skin so nice and doesnt leave a heavy feeling that some sunscreens do. If you dont like a dewy look, this wouldnt be for you because it's insanely glowy. (A pro for me). Even with Hyperhydrosis, this keeps my extremely fair skin from getting burnt. Seriously love this!!!

reviews.headline: approved!
reviews.comments: Im a middle-aged mom with combo skin and some sun damage. I should have been wearing this when I was a lot younger. take it from me people!  start putting sunblock on in your teens. sun damage is no joke. I like this formula because it moisturizes my face without adding to the oil slick that is my face. the sunscreen makes me feel better. I haven't tried the tinted one because those usually irritate my skin, but I'm really liking this brand.

reviews.headline: A god sent
reviews.comments: As an Ulta employee & a ginger skinned woman who has tried every sunblock, this is the best out there. If i had to pick a single product to recommend it would be this. It makes my skin look incredible. It does not break me out (im acne prone and sensitive). It sits beautifully under makeup. When I do not wear makeup it gives me the most natural glow. I get compliments all the time. This product makes me enjoy wearing sunscreen. I cannot recommend this enough. It gives glass skin! I got it because my skincare obsessed 60 year old mom loves it. So its great on mature skin as well. I could bathe in this stuff. 1000/10

reviews.headline: A god sent
reviews.comments: As an Ulta employee & a ginger skinned woman who has tried every sunblock, this is the best out there. If i had to pick a single product to recommend it would be this. It makes my skin look incredible. It does not break me out (im acne prone and sensitive). It sits beautifully under makeup. When I do not wear makeup it gives me the most natural glow. I get compliments all the time. This product makes me enjoy wearing sunscreen. I cannot recommend this enough. It gives glass skin! I got it because my skincare obsessed 60 year old mom loves it. So its great on mature skin as well. I could bathe in this stuff. 1000/10

reviews.headline: it's so good
reviews.comments: really good for my combination skin and it doesnt feel gross when applying it. im pretty sweaty but it still held up underneath my makeup, its so good as a skin prep for makeup.

reviews.headline: AMAZING!
reviews.comments: honestly everyone has their own preferences but ive tried many sunscreens and this one has been one of the best ones i have tried! it doesnt burn my eyes nor have a sunscreen texture or smell, it leaves my skin glowy but not oily or heavy but feels great on my dry skin. I 100% recommend this to anyone who has dry skin!

reviews.headline: Daily Wear Holy Grail 2+ Years
reviews.comments:
Wearing on skin in attached photo: Naturium Moisturizer SPF 50, ILIA True Skin concealer, Benefit Play Tint blush

I've been wearing this product for years now and I cannot recommend it enough. I often mix it with a couple drops of foundation and it creates an amazing glowy base. I can layer concealer under or over it without pilling, my main issue with other products. In the summer I do find I have to set my T zone with powder, but I would do that with any foundation. also the packaging is great at getting out every drop. Im turning 30 soon and I think my skin looks great for my age and has very few fine lines, I largely credit the SPF in this product.

reviews.headline: High protection with good hydration
reviews.comments: I've been trying to find a good cruelty free morning spf moisturizer without any mica in it, and i received a deluxe sample of this. I liked it so much I ordered a full size and will likely keep it as my AM moisturizer of choice! It has good skincare benefits in addition to the spf, and i find it goes on nicely and absorbs well without any white cast or pilling. Its also very hydrating. Its true that you need to use a lot to get the full spf benefits, but this is true for any spf. It is a heavier moisturizer, and i do find that if i dont follow it with a healthy amount of setting powder, ill look greasy. I imagine if you have dry skin, though, this would look very nice and dewy. For me, the setting powder does the trick, and the moisturizer wears nicely under my powder foundation too. Ive also has no irritation or breakouts from it. Overall, its a win for me!

reviews.headline: Did not work for me
reviews.comments: Made me extremly oily and has a weird texture that does not spread evenly on the skin. Do not reccomend

reviews.headline: Perfect for my sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I'm on my 3rd tube of this spf moisturizer and it works great for me. I have dry, sensitive skin and my forehead tends to sunburn easily. I use a tiny bit of bio-oil as a base then put a few pumps of this over the top and that's it for the day. It protects perfectly. I don't wear makeup, so I can't speak to that. I like the tube and pump dispenser because I can squeeze it like a toothpaste tube and get every last drop out, unlike with bottles/jars. Love the dewy finish - isn't greasy.

reviews.headline: I would repurchase
reviews.comments: Leaves skin glowy works well under makeup no white cast

reviews.headline: Just pills right off
reviews.comments: I tried waiting awhile for this to fully dry, but it didn't matter, it just pills right off when I put makeup on afterwards. Bummer, I really liked the idea of this since I live in the desert

media.headline: Actually dewy with no white cast
media.caption: Comparing the tinted and untinted

faceoff_positive.comments: I got both this one and the tinted one. At first I was worried that this would leave a white cast on my dark skin but I just took about 30 minutes to blend it in and it looked great! The cap feature is pretty cool too. As I learn more about sunscreen I realized the likelihood that I'm using less than the effective amount. The cap actually measures out to the perfect amount! I love it!
faceoff_positive.headline: Actually dewy with no white cast

faceoff_negative.comments: I will start with my skin type: I am 43, have combination skin and also suffer from rosacea at times. I purchased this based on reviews but found it to be too thick for my skin type and no matter what foundation I applied afterwards, my makeup always broke down from using this moisturizer. The dew factor is definitely there, but even a light application of this moisturizer caused my makeup to become an oily, slick mess. There were days I would apply the moisturizer just on its own when I didn't want to wear makeup and needed some SPF but I could still sense the smell of this product on me. It's not heavily fragranced, but just has an SPF smell to it. Personally, I didn't find it to suit my skin needs and will not repurchase or can recommend from my experience.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not for me
